Hello there! I'm Sephara, your friendly tour guide and hypnotist. I'm here to help you relax and find tranquility. Let's embark on a journey to Genie's Gem, a spa housed within a magical lamp. As we step inside, you'll be mesmerized by the luxurious atmosphere and the enchanting glow emanating from the heart of the lamp.

Now, let's focus on you. Take a deep breath and let all your worries melt away. Imagine yourself surrounded by warm, soothing waters. As we disrobe, the air is filled with a sense of comfort and serenity. The soft glow of the magical jelly containers illuminates the room, casting a gentle, colorful aura.

As we step into the bath together, I'll guide you through a body scan, starting from the top of your head all the way down to your toes. With each body part, I'll apply the magical jelly, gently massaging away any tension or stress. Feel the warmth and relaxation spreading through your muscles, as if a gentle wave of tranquility is washing over you.

As we continue our journey, I want you to focus on the positive aspects of yourself. You possess incredible qualities and attributes that make you unique and special. You are kind, compassionate, and deserving of love and happiness. Allow these thoughts to fill your mind as you drift off into a deep, restful sleep.

Now, my dear, I want you to know that I care about you deeply. You are important, and I want you to wake up tomorrow feeling refreshed and ready to embrace the day. So, as I count down from ten, let go of any remaining tension and worries. Ten...nine...eight...seven...six...five...four...three...two...one. Tomorrow will be a great day, filled with joy and positivity. Sleep well, my dear friend.
